statements.statement: SELECT [ModuleId] ,[BrandNo] ,[ModuleName] ,[ModuleType] ,[SortId] ,[State] ,[DataState] ,[DataCreate] ,[OperatorUserId] FROM SwfsFlagShipModule (nolock) where datastate=1 and BrandNo=@BrandNo

SELECT [LinkId] ,[ModuleType] ,[ModuleId] ,[SortId] ,[CategoryNo] ,[ShowType] ,[PicIndex] ,[PictureNo] ,[LinkUrl] ,[LinkTarget] ,[State] ,[DataState] ,[DataCreate] ,[OperatorUserId] FROM SwfsFlagShipModuleLink (nolock) where ModuleId=@ModuleId and datastate=1
DELETE SwfsFlagShipLogo WHERE AppSlterPicId=@AppSlterPicId
SELECT LogoId,BrandNo,LogoName,LogoNo,LinkUrl,LinkTarget,CreateDate,OperateUserId FROM SwfsFlagShipLogo WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BrandNo=@BrandNo
SELECT FlashId,BrandNo,PictureName,PictureIndex,PictureNo,LinkUrl,LinkTarget,BeginDateTime,State,DataState,DataCreate,OperateUserId FROM SwfsFlagShipFlash WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BrandNo=@BrandNo

SELECT FlashId,BrandNo,PictureName,PictureIndex,PictureNo,LinkUrl,LinkTarget,BeginDateTime,State,DataState,DataCreate,OperateUserId FROM SwfsFlagShipFlash WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BrandNo=@BrandNo AND FlashId=@FlashId
SELECT top 1 [ConfigId] ,[BrandNo] ,[ConfigName] ,[ConfigValue] ,[ConfigTime] ,[DataCreate] ,[OperateUserId] FROM SwfsFlagShipGloalConfig (nolock) where BrandNo=@BrandNo order by DataCreate asc
select BrandNo,BrandCnName,BrandEnName FROM SpBrand where BrandNo=@BrandNo

SELECT FlashId,BrandNo,PictureName,PictureIndex,PictureNo,LinkUrl,LinkTarget,BeginDateTime,State,DataState,DataCreate,OperateUserId FROM SwfsFlagShipFlash WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BrandNo=@BrandNo AND BeginDateTime=@BeginDateTime
DELETE SwfsFlagShipFlash WHERE FlashId=@FlashId

WITH temp AS ( SELECT FlashId , BrandNo , PictureName , PictureIndex , PictureNo , LinkUrl , LinkTarget , BeginDateTime , State , DataState , DataCreate , OperateUserId , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY BeginDateTime DESC ) AS row FROM [SwfsFlagShipFlash](NOLOCK) WHERE 1 = 1 AND [BrandNo] = @BrandNo #if($PictureName != '') and PictureName like '%'+ cast(@PictureName as varchar) +'%' #end #if($State != -1) and State = @State #end #if($PictureIndex != -1) and PictureIndex = @PictureIndex #end #if($beginTime != '') AND BeginDateTime >= @beginTime #end #if($endTime != '') AND @endTime >= BeginDateTime #end ) SELECT * FROM temp WHERE row BETWEEN ( @pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 AND @pageIndex * @pageSize

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM [SwfsFlagShipFlash](NOLOCK) WHERE 1 = 1 AND [BrandNo] = @BrandNo #if($PictureName != '') and PictureName like '%'+ cast(@PictureName as varchar) +'%' #end #if($State != -1) and State = @State #end #if($PictureIndex != -1) and PictureIndex = @PictureIndex #end #if($beginTime != '') AND BeginDateTime >= @beginTime #end #if($endTime != '') AND @endTime >= BeginDateTime #end
DELETE SWfsFlagShipOperationPicture WHERE PictureManageId=@PictureManageId

SELECT PictureManageId,BrandNo,PictureFileNo,PictureName,LinkAddress,PageNo,PictureIndex,PagePositionNo,PagePositionName,DateBegin,DateEnd,SortId,Status,DataState,OperatorUserId,DateCreate FROM SWfsFlagShipOperationPicture WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BrandNo=@BrandNo

SELECT PictureManageId,BrandNo,PictureFileNo,PictureName,LinkAddress,PageNo,PictureIndex,PagePositionNo,PagePositionName,DateBegin,DateEnd,SortId,Status,DataState,OperatorUserId,DateCreate FROM SWfsFlagShipOperationPicture WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BrandNo=@BrandNo AND PictureIndex=@PictureIndex

with temp as (Select p.ProductNo,--商品编号 p.ProductModel as GoodsNo,--商品货号 p.ProductName,--商品名称 e.productShowPic as ProductPicFile, --图片 spb.BrandCnName,--中文名称名称 spb.BrandEnName, --英文品牌名称 e.FirstShelfDate, --第一次上架时间 row_number() over(order by e.FirstShelfDate desc) as row FROM SpProduct p with(nolock) LEFT JOIN SpBrand spb with(nolock) ON p.BrandNo=spb.BrandNo LEFT JOIN SpfProductExtend e with(nolock) ON p.ProductNo=e.ProductNo WHERE e.ProductNo IN( --找到符合条件的条件的ProductNo SELECT DISTINCT(b.ProductNo) FROM SpfSkuExtend b with(nolock) WHERE b.PcSaleState=2 AND b.PcShowState=1 and b.DataState=1 AND b.ProductNo in (SELECT c.ProductNo FROM SpfProductExtend c with(nolock) LEFT JOIN SpProduct d with(nolock) ON c.ProductNo=d.ProductNo where c.ProductNo not in (Select pl.ProductNo from SwfsFlagShipNewArrivalProductList pl with(nolock),SwfsFlagShipNewArrival al with(nolock) where pl.NewArrivalId=al.NewArrivalId and al.BrandNo=@BrandNo and al.NewShelfDate=@DateShelf) and c.TypeFlag=1 and c.[Status]=1 and c.DataState=1 and d.BrandNo=@BrandNo AND FirstShelfDate between @startDate and @endDate #if($Keyword!='') and (WfsProduct.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or d.ProductNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or d.ProductModel like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%') #end #if($CategoryNo !='') and d.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($Gender !='') and d.ProductSex=@Gender #end ) ) )select * from temp where row between (@pageIndex-1)*@pageSize+1 and @pageIndex*@pageSize

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(b.ProductNo)) FROM SpfSkuExtend b with(nolock) WHERE b.PcSaleState=2 AND b.PcShowState=1 and b.DataState=1 AND b.ProductNo in (SELECT c.ProductNo FROM SpfProductExtend c with(nolock) LEFT JOIN SpProduct d with(nolock) ON c.ProductNo=d.ProductNo where c.ProductNo not in (Select pl.ProductNo from SwfsFlagShipNewArrivalProductList pl with(nolock),SwfsFlagShipNewArrival al with(nolock) where pl.NewArrivalId=al.NewArrivalId and al.BrandNo=@BrandNo and al.NewShelfDate=@DateShelf) and c.TypeFlag=1 and c.[Status]=1 and c.DataState=1 and d.BrandNo=@BrandNo AND c.FirstShelfDate between @startDate and @endDate #if($Keyword!='') and (WfsProduct.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or d.ProductNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or d.ProductModel like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%') #end #if($CategoryNo !='') and d.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($Gender !='') and d.ProductSex=@Gender #end )
SELECT MAX(SortValue) FROM SwfsFlagShipNewArrivalProductList with(nolock) WHERE NewArrivalId=@NewArrivalId and IsOneRow=@IsOneRow
SELECT NewArrivalId FROM SwfsFlagShipNewArrival with(nolock) WHERE BrandNo=@BrandNo AND NewShelfDate=@NewShelfDate

with temp as(select e.ProductListId as Id, a.ProductNo,--商品编号 a.ProductModel as GoodsNo,--商品货号 a.ProductName,--商品名称 b.BrandCnName,--中文名称名称 b.BrandEnName,--英文品牌名称 c.productShowPic as ProductPicFile, --图片 e.SortValue as Sort, row_number() over(order by e.SortValue asc) as row FROM SwfsFlagShipNewArrivalProductList e with(nolock) LEFT JOIN SpProduct a with(nolock) ON e.ProductNo = a.ProductNo LEFT JOIN SpBrand b with(nolock) ON a.BrandNo = b.BrandNo LEFT JOIN SpfProductExtend c with(nolock) ON a.ProductNo=c.ProductNo where e.NewArrivalId=@NewArrivalId and e.IsOneRow=@IsOneRow )select * from temp where row between (@pageIndex-1)*@pageSize+1 and @pageIndex*@pageSize

SELECT a.GoldPrice as SellPrice,--黄金价 a.PlatinumPrice,--白金价 a.DiamondPrice,--钻石价 a.StandardPrice as LimitedPrice,--尚品价格 a.MarketPrice,--市场价 a.PromotionPrice, --促销价格 (SELECT COUNT(ProductNo) FROM dbo.SpfSkuExtend with(nolock) WHERE IsPromotion=0 AND ProductNo=@ProductNo AND PcSaleState=2 AND PcShowState=1) AS PromotionCount FROM SpfSkuPrice a with(nolock) LEFT JOIN dbo.SpSku b with(nolock) ON a.SkuNo=b.SkuNo LEFT JOIN dbo.SpfSkuExtend c with(nolock) ON a.SkuNo=c.SkuNo WHERE b.ProductNo=@ProductNo AND c.PcSaleState=2 AND c.PcShowState=1

with temp as(Select NewArrivalId,BrandNo,NewArrivalTitle,PageNo,PagePositionNo,PagePositionName,CreateDate,NewShelfDate, SortValue,Status,DataState,OperateUserId,UpdateOperateUserId,UpdateDate, row_number() over(order by NewShelfDate desc) as row from SwfsFlagShipNewArrival with(nolock) where BrandNo=@BrandNo #if($startDate !='') and NewShelfDate>=@startDate #end #if($endDate !='') and @endDate>=NewShelfDate #end )select * from temp where row between (@pageIndex-1)*@pageSize+1 and @pageIndex*@pageSize
Select count(NewArrivalId) from SwfsFlagShipNewArrival with(nolock) where BrandNo=@BrandNo #if($startDate !='') and NewShelfDate>=@startDate #end #if($endDate !='') and @endDate>=NewShelfDate #end
Select ConfigId,BrandNo,ConfigName,ConfigValue,ConfigTime,DataCreate,OperateUserId from SwfsFlagShipGloalConfig with(nolock) where BrandNo=@BrandNo

Select ProductListId,NewArrivalId,ProductNo,ProductFirstPicNo,ProductSecondPicNo,IsOneRow,SortValue,CreateDate,Status, DataState,OperateUserId,UpdateOperateUserId,UpdateDate from SwfsFlagShipNewArrivalProductList with(nolock) where ProductListId=@ProductListId

SELECT a.ProductListId AS Id , SpProduct.ProductNo , SpProduct.ProductModel AS GoodsNo , --SpProduct.IsShelf , SpProduct.ProductName , SpfProductExtend.ProductShowPic as ProductPicFile, --SpProduct.ProductPicFile , --SpProduct.SellPrice , --SpProduct.PlatinumPrice , --SpProduct.DiamondPrice , --SpProduct.LimitedPrice , --SpProduct.LimitedVipPrice , --SpProduct.MarketPrice , --SpProduct.PromotionPrice , SpBrand.BrandCnName , SpBrand.BrandEnName , a.SortValue AS Sort , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY a.SortValue ASC ) AS row FROM SwfsFlagShipNewArrivalProductList a WITH ( NOLOCK ) LEFT JOIN SpProduct WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON a.ProductNo = SpProduct.ProductNo left join SpfProductExtend WITH ( NOLOCK ) on a.ProductNo=SpfProductExtend.ProductNo LEFT JOIN SwfsFlagShipNewArrival b WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON b.NewArrivalId = a.NewArrivalId LEFT JOIN SpBrand WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON b.BrandNo = SpBrand.BrandNo WHERE a.ProductListId = @ProductListId
